modals.title: BirthRide
modals.description: Bacon ipsum dolor amet tongue pork loin flank beef burgdoggen drumstick t-bone. Pork loin venison short loin, kevin tenderloin hamburger kielbasa brisket biltong. Salami buffalo tail picanha tongue turkey, pork chop kielbasa capicola spare ribs corned beef ham hock andouille. truths.question: I was not born in the United States.
truths.answer: I was born in London, England!

truths.question: I once, unknowingly, slept on top of a lizard.
truths.answer: Long story, but it wasn't pretty...

truths.question: I've taken a train lasting over 24 hours.
truths.answer: The summer I spent in India we took a train from Chiplun to Kochi in Kerala. It took over 24+ hours but was worth every second.

truths.question: I can play 6 songs on the Banjo.
truths.answer: Cripple Creek, Banjo in the Holla, Boil them Cabbage Down, You are my sunshine, Foggy Mountain Breakdown, and Wagon Wheel

truths.question: I've never had a favorite sports team win a championship.
truths.answer: Jets, Mets, and Knicks remain undefeated in breaking my heart every year.

lies.question: I can count backwards from 312 on command.
I've never seen a Broadway musical.
lies.answer: I've seen a few! Most notably The Lion King and Mamma Mia

lies.question: I once shared an airplane aisle with celebrity chef Gordon Ramsey.
lies.answer: So absurd it must be true right? Unfortunately not, but maybe one day Gordon and I will share a plane.
